title: New Client STILL cannot buy champs with IP......
body: Since the new client emerged and now that they have permanently done away with the legacy client, I STILL CAN'T buy new champs with IP. This is a realllyyyyyyyy annoying bug and you need to figure it out riot

replies.body: Are you getting any errors?  I double checked your account and also refreshed your balance to make sure everything is accurate.  Just make sure that you're using the client's Store option to unlock content.  Collections doesn't have content unlocking available just yet.  Let me know if that clears things up!
yes that was the problem, didn't realize could just do it in store. Thank YOU!!!!!!

I have the same problem.
I open collection menu to buy champions with ip but it says not yet implemented!!!!
